text: Dinzuɣu, (Yaa nyini Annabi)! A ni nya ka ninvuɣu shεba doro ni be bɛ suhiri ni maa naan niŋdi yomyoma m- kpεri bɛ (chɛfurinim’) puuni, ka naan yεra: “Tinim’ zɔrimi ni yɛlibɛɣu ti nya ti,” tɔ! Naawuni nyɛla Ŋun yɛn tahi nasara na, bee ka yεltɔɣa shεli yi O sani na, ka bɛ leei ban yolitεm ni bɛ ni sɔɣi shɛli bɛ suhiri ni maa
